meanings.definition: A fitness class that takes place in water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy attending aquafit classes at the pool.
meanings.sent2: Aquafit is a fun way to exercise while staying cool in the water.
meanings.sent3: The aquafit instructor made us laugh with their water aerobics routine.
meanings.sent4: In the shimmering pool, aquafit felt like a dance with the water itself.
meanings.sent5: The splashes and laughter in aquafit made it a memorable experience.

meanings.definition: To participate in a fitness class that takes place in water.
meanings.sent1: She aquafits every Monday and Wednesday to stay active.
meanings.sent2: We will aquafit together next week for a refreshing workout.
meanings.sent3: He aquafits so gracefully, it's like watching a water ballet.
meanings.sent4: The synchronized aquafitting of the team was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: Aquafitting in the pool makes me feel weightless and free.
